title: The Worst Super Tuesday Choices Ever | Guest: Dr. Robert Epstein | 3/3/20
description:
It’s Super Tuesday, and you know it’s bad when Glenn has liquor on standby. Joe Biden can’t even quote the Declaration of Independence. And MSNBC’s Chris Matthews has retired after decades of hosting “Hardball.” But was it his age, his scandals, or his refusal to play the revolutionaries’ games? Dr. Robert Epstein asks whether your vote even matters thanks to YouTube and Google. The stock markets corrected themselves after last week’s coronavirus scare, and Glenn is sick of Democrats blasting Trump on coronavirus when 1,000 people died of the swine flu before Obama responded similarly. And in a “Profile in Courage,” Glenn and Stu honor the “bravery” of Mike Bloomberg and Harry Reid. Also, it’s completely safe to eat Chinese food!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: It’s Super Tuesday, and between Bernie, Biden, and Bloomberg, Democrats have NO good options.
